dialogue.message: It's the morning, the sun rose half an hour ago, Adele is outside her house setting up a cart full of potion supplies and merchandise. She's attaching the cart to her floating broomstick

dialogue.name: Nix
dialogue.speaker: left
dialogue.message: Hoi! Need any help?
A familiar voice calls out from down the path.  It was Nix! The cursemaker in her fleshy human self - not a fuzzy curse-lemur thing, or anything like that!

dialogue.name: Nix
dialogue.message: Never did learn how to pilot a broom, but I can at least help you get stuff set up!

dialogue.name: Adele
dialogue.speaker: right
dialogue.message: Oh thanks Nix, I only have one bag left, next to the door

dialogue.name: Nix
dialogue.speaker: left
dialogue.message: So what are these potions, huh? Nothing volatile, or something I need to worry about splashing on me, right? I don't wanna turn into a doormat, or something.

dialogue.name: Adele
dialogue.speaker: right
dialogue.message: Oh don't worry, it's just regular stuff for adventurers, potions of healing, strength... that kind of stuff

dialogue.name: Nix
dialogue.speaker: left
dialogue.message: That so, huh..?
The cursemaker snickered, taking one of those potions, swishing the liquid around inside. She wondered if she could taint one of those potions of strength. Maybe cause unwanted physical changes?
...Nah, she didn't want to mess with Adele's merch - she seemed to get upset if Nix drank 'em; she wouldn't appreciate the cursemaker spiking them with hexes..

dialogue.name: Adele
dialogue.speaker: right
dialogue.message: I'm going to the town of Trifort, it's close to the border, and apparently they're hiring a lot of adventurers right now, so I smell opportunity

dialogue.name: Nix
dialogue.speaker: left
dialogue.message: ...Eh? Trifort? I've heard of that place, but never been there myself.. Hiring adventurers, huh..? You think they'd take you? Your potions are good, but you never really seemed like the dungeon delving type.. More of a... merchant NPC, y'know?

dialogue.name: Adele
dialogue.speaker: right
dialogue.message: Well... you're kinda right...
she blushes in embarrassment, as she remember the last time the duo where stuck in a dungeon
Nix flushed a light pink at that - wholly blamed Adele for that loss!

dialogue.name: Adele
dialogue.speaker: right
dialogue.message: So, wanna come with?

dialogue.speaker: left
dialogue.name: Nix
dialogue.message: Sure, I don't have anything better to do..

dialogue.speaker: left
dialogue.message: The cursemaker gave a light shrug of her shoulders

dialogue.speaker: left
dialogue.name: Nix
dialogue.message: ...Do I ride on the back of your broom? Can it carry us both? Probably struggles to carry you!

dialogue.name: Adele
dialogue.speaker: right
dialogue.message: Sh-shut up! It can carry me easily!

dialogue.speaker: right
dialogue.message: Adele looks at the cart

dialogue.name: Adele
dialogue.speaker: right
dialogue.message: But it can barely carry the cart, we'll have to walk alongside it...
To be continued!
